1.0.name: wordpress/easy-set-favicon
1.0.description:
Set the fav-icon in your blog or website just by putting a link.

Features

  • Easy and simple.
  • You can make any types of image as your fav-icon in your wordpress website.
  • You can put any link either from website or from media library.

Author

Brought to you by Md. Eftakhairul Islam & Sirajus Salayhin

Contribute

This may have bugs and lack of many features. If you want to contribute on this project, you are more than welcome. Please fork the repository from Github.
